testimonials.name: Allison Hayes
testimonials.quote: “I recently had the pleasure of visiting Doral for a dental check-up, and I couldn't be more impressed. From the moment I walked in, the friendly and welcoming staff set the tone for a positive experience.”

testimonials.name: Samantha Hernandez
testimonials.quote: “I must recommend Doral enough! From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed and cared for. The staff was incredibly friendly and professional, and my dentist was thorough and attentive.”

testimonials.name: Christopher Taylor
testimonials.quote: “Five stars for Doral Service! I recently had a dental emergency and was able to get an appointment right away. They took the time to listen to my concerns and address them with care.”

location: 2nd Floor, Shop no. 2032, JMS Crosswalk, Sector 93, Gurugram, Haryana 122505

services.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
services.description: Cosmetic dentistry mainly concerns improving the appearance of your teeth, including whitening.

services.title: Pediatric Dentistry
services.description: Pediatric dentistry is tailored to ensure infants, children, and teens can receive the best dental care.

services.title: Dental Implants
services.description: Dental implants replace the missing tooth by implanting artificial roots into the jaw under surgical.

services.title: Periodontal Therapy
services.description: Periodontal therapy is technically all about restoring the diseased or damaged tissues to an original.

services.title: Teeth Whitening
services.description: Our dentists will clean up your teeth, conduct a thorough check before covering the teeth with a new.

services.title: General Dentistry
services.description: Our dentists will clean up your teeth, conduct a thorough check before covering the teeth with a new.

services.title: Bonding
services.description: Dental bonding helps improve the appearance of teeth by repairing chips and cracks.

services.title: Checkups
services.description: Regular checkups help in early detection of dental issues and maintaining oral health.

services.title: Cosmetic Procedures
services.description: Cosmetic procedures enhance your smile's aesthetics through various techniques.

services.title: Dentures & Bridges
services.description: Dentures and bridges are prosthetic devices that replace missing teeth.

services.title: Emergency Care
services.description: Emergency dental care is available for urgent issues that require immediate attention.

services.title: Extractions
services.description: Tooth extractions involve the removal of teeth that are damaged or decayed.

services.title: Fillings & Sealants
services.description: Fillings repair cavities, while sealants protect teeth from decay.

services.title: Laser Dentistry
services.description: Laser dentistry uses lasers to treat various dental conditions effectively and painlessly.

services.title: Mouth Guards
services.description: Mouth guards protect teeth from injury during sports or teeth grinding.

services.title: Online Dentist Booking
services.description: Book your dental appointments online for convenience and ease.

services.title: Oral Surgery
services.description: Oral surgery includes procedures like wisdom teeth removal and jaw surgery.

services.title: Pediatrics
services.description: Pediatric dentistry focuses on the dental care of children from infancy to adolescence.

services.title: Root Canals
services.description: Root canals treat infected or damaged tooth pulp to relieve pain and save the tooth.

services.title: Teeth Cleaning
services.description: Professional teeth cleaning removes plaque and tartar to maintain oral health.

services.title: Teeth Reshaping
services.description: Teeth reshaping involves altering the length, shape, or surface of the teeth.

services.title: Veneers & Crowns
services.description: Veneers and crowns cover damaged teeth to improve their appearance and function.

services.title: X-ray
services.description: Dental X-rays help diagnose issues below the surface that are not visible during exams.
